about.summary: Measures number of Terminal column cells of wide-character codes.

name: wcwidth
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.1.7" %}

package:
    name: wcwidth
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: wcwidth-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/w/wcwidth/wcwidth-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 3df37372226d6e63e1b1e1eda15c594bca98a22d33a23832a90998faa96bc65e

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python

test:
    imports:
        - wcwidth
        - wcwidth.tests

about:
    home: https://github.com/jquast/wcwidth
    license: MIT
    summary: 'Measures number of Terminal column cells of wide-character codes.'

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
